participant_1.background:
I am a fourth child who was once lucky enough to swim with manta rays.
I'm not sure if my family would be accepting of me, but I hope they would be.
i used to be able to run really fast.
My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.
i enjoy playing guitar and video games.

participant_2.background:
I love using my camcorder to film my friends and family.
Every Sunday, I sing in the choir and then go for a drive to clear my mind.
I help my grandparents with their daily activities.
i take martial arts after school.
I have a passion for helping couples create the perfect wedding day.

content.text: Hi I'm participant_1. What's your name?
I'm participant_2. nice to meet you participant_2
Nice to meet you too. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to sing in the choir and film my friends and family with my camcorder.
I used to sing in the choir too! I love singing.
That's awesome! Do you still sing?
Not as much as I used to, but I still enjoy it when I do.
That's great. I like to sing because it's a good way to express myself.
I agree. I also like singing because it's a great way to connect with others.
That's a great point. I also like to use my camcorder to film my friends and family.
That's cool! What do you like to film them doing?
I like to film them doing anything, but I especially like filming them when they're doing something funny or interesting.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm glad you have a hobby that you enjoy.
Thanks! I am too. I think it's important to have hobbies that you enjoy.
I agree. Hobbies can help us to relax and de-stress.
That's a good point. I also think hobbies can help us to connect with others.
I agree. Hobbies can be a great way to meet new people and make new friends.
That's why I like to use my camcorder to film my friends and family. It's a great way to connect with them and to document our lives together.
That's a great way to look at it. I'm sure your friends and family appreciate you filming them.
I hope so! I love filming them and I love watching the videos back later.
I'm sure they love watching them too!
I hope so. I'm glad you think my hobby is cool.
I think it's a great hobby. You're lucky to have a hobby that you enjoy so much.
Thanks! I am lucky. I'm glad I have hobbies that I enjoy.
I'm glad too. Hobbies can make life a lot more fun.
They sure can
